title: Channel Islands National Park: Pets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Pets              Pets         Â    In order to protect island wildlife, pets are not allowed in the park. Please leave your pets at home. Some of the diseases and parasites that now threaten the fox may have been carried to the islands by animals from the mainland. While a domestic dog might have immunity from certain parasites and diseases, it may still carry them. Due to their insular existence, island foxes have no such built-up immunity to many of these ailments and are quite vulnerable to them. So please help protect the island fox and other island animals by leaving pets at home.
